alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 7:10PM CDT until July 28 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in central Kansas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 710 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Victor, or 11 miles northwest of Lincoln, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lincoln, Sylvan Grove, Beverly, Barnard and Ash Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
